Total Credits: Students complete the pre-pharmacy curriculum in 85 credits.

STAT 350 - Statistics with Applications in the Biological Sciences (4)

or CHEM 437 - Comprehensive Biochemistry: BIOL 141 - Foundations of Biology: Cells, Energy and Organisms (4)
BIOL 142 - Foundations of Biology: Ecology and Evolution (4)
BIOL 251 - Human Anatomy and Physiology I (3)
BIOL 252 - Human Anatomy and Physiology II (3)

Arts and Humanities Electives (6 credits: Choose among Africana studies, American studies, ancient studies, English, fine arts excluding studio courses, foreign languages, music, and philosophy.
Social Sciences Electives (6 credits): Choose among Africana studies, anthropology, economics, geography, history, political science, psychology, sociology.
